info.name: Gwynne Sleeper Sofa
info.description: The Gwynne Sleeper Sofa is a something of an overachiever, ensuring you’ll never be short of options for overnight guests again. Not only does the large cushion fold out to form a cozy bed, this stylish hybrid from the Blu Dot x Fab collaboration also comes with comfy toss pillows with contrasting fronts and backs—colorful vs. neutral. Mix and match, and flip and flop these accessories to satisfy your evolving style standard
